text: A vizier is an Arabic word for a kind of government official in some Muslim countries. A vizier would usually work for a Muslim monarch like a Caliph, Sultan or an Emir. ==Related pages== *Grand vizier ==Notes== ==References== * Etymology OnLine * Royal Ark, dynasties in historical context - see each muslim nation quoted in this article, often in the section 'Glossary' * WorldStatesmen - click on each Islamic present state Category:Heads of state Category:Mughal Empire Category:Government occupations
title: Vizier
